analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#550-564) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#559-562)

BlockportPresale.validPurchase.whitelisted (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#673-675) shadows:
	- Whitelist.whitelisted (modifier @ /unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#444-446)

BlockportPresale.setRate (/unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#687-689) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xb901cbb8b07e0dd7e114284ca63f4092c7683322.sol#39-47) should be declared external
